definition: A small, rounded, and typically brown object that is often found in forests and is associated with trees. It is commonly used in various crafts and can be collected as a natural curiosity.

examples.german: Die Eichel ist die Frucht der Eiche.
examples.english: The acorn is the fruit of the oak tree.

examples.german: Die Eichel dient als Nahrung für Eichhörnchen.
examples.english: Acorns serve as food for squirrels.

examples.german: Die Eichel wird im Herbst von den Bäumen fallen.
examples.english: The acorns will fall from the trees in autumn.

examples.german: Die Eichel hat eine harte Schale.
examples.english: The acorn has a hard shell.

examples.german: Eicheln können zu Mehl gemahlen werden.
examples.english: Acorns can be ground into flour.
